text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Luxor Governorate | settlement_type = Governorate | image_flag = Eg luxor1.png | flag_size = 120px | image_blank_emblem = Coat of Arms of Luxor Governorate.jpg | blank_emblem_size = 75px | image_map = Luxor in Egypt (special marker).svg | map_caption = Luxor Governorate on the map of Egypt | coordinates = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | seat = Luxor (capital) | leader_party = | leader_title = Governor | leader_name = | government_footnotes = | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = 55 | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | population_footnotes = | population_total = 1270000 | population_as_of = January 2018 | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = EET | utc_offset1 = +2 | timezone1_DST = | utc_offset1_DST = | blank_name_sec2 = | blank_info_sec2 = | website = | iso_code = | calling_code = | footnotes = }} Luxor Governorate is a governorate in Egypt. The capital city is also named Luxor. It was created in 2009 from part of the Qena Governorate.Luxor announced Egyptâ€™s 29th governorate , report of Daily News Egypt of 7 December 2009. == References == Category:21st-century establishments in Egypt Category:2000s establishments in Africa Category:2009 establishments
